text: Ba ʙa rosti, ej Rasul, pes az tu pajomʙaronero ʙa sui qavmason ʙa unvoni ʙasoratdihanda va ʙimdihanda firistodem. Onho ʙo mu'cizaho va dalelhoi ravsani xud nazdason omadand. Pas, Mo az kasone, ki gunoh kardand, intiqom giriftem va halokason soxtem va jori dodani mu'minon ʙar uhdai Mo ʙud. Incunin mekunem ʙo takziʙkunandagoni tu, modome, ki ʙar duruƣason pojdor ʙosand va imon naorand
